instructions: Open WhatsApp. Tap the three dots or hamburger menu to the top right of the screen. Tap Settings . Tap Account . Tap Change Number . Tap Next . Enter your old phone number, then enter the new phone number. Tap Next . Tap Done .

Open WhatsApp. Open a conversation you want to save. Tap the three dots or hamburger menu . Tap More . Tap Export Chat . Choose to either include media (such as photos, GIFs, and voice clips) or not. Including media will make the file size much bigger. Choose to save the file somewhere. This can be Google Drive or you can email it to yourself, such as to your new iPhone email address. The file is now viewable as a text file on your iPhone.
